about_the_game:
Is this how you train a dragon? Nope! They make for cute pets though, but more importantly, I hear they make some valuable stuff $.$

I wonder how many types of dragons are there? I wonder if there'll be a blue eyed and white scaled dragon? There's going to be so much money to be made! Er.. dragons to be ranched..! This won't be easy though. I'll need to make a lot of different kinds of buildings to ensure their survival and happiness. Soon enough, I'll be able to make a huge utopia for myself too! Let's build a ranch!

Features:
Turn a barren plot of land into a prosperous ranch that your dragons will roam and play in.
Hatch eggs that will spawn a random dragon. Find out which ones you will get or collect them all!
Play through a day and night cycle as well as a weather system.
Customize your ranch and build wherever you want in a place anywhere building system.
Use different decorations to make your own unique ranch.
Grow food and feed your dragons in order to become rich.

name: Baby Dragon Rancher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit processor and Operating System
  • Processor: 1-2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory

short_description: Dragons are famous for their money hoarding and wealth. If only I could use some of that for myself, but adults are too vicious to tame. Baby dragons won't be though! It's time to collect them all! Time to get rich, and maybe I can finally pay off my student loans!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
